resources.string: Create a case for this contact person
Open case of this contact person
Move case to another health facility \u279D
Moving the case will discard any unsaved changes. Do you want to continue?
Please log in to your account.
There are no synchronization conflicts to display.
Downloading new SORMAS version... Depending on your internet connection, this may take a while.
In EPID-week %1$s from %2$s to %3$s, you have reported the following disease cases:
You have not yet confirmed the report for last week.
No data available for this epi week.
A new version of the SORMAS app is available. It is strongly recommended to download it by clicking the \'Download\' button below.
A new version of the SORMAS app is available, but the download is currently not possible. Your supervisor will automatically be notified about this issue.

The download of the new SORMAS version failed. Please make sure you have the best internet connection possible and try again or inform a supervisor if you keep getting this error despite a good internet connection.
A new SORMAS version is ready to install. Please click on \'Install\' to continue. You will need to restart the app after the update has been completed.

There was an error installing the new SORMAS version. Maybe the downloaded file was incomplete because of an interrupted download. Please click on \'Redownload\' to try again or inform a supervisor if this error occurs again.
There was an error installing the new SORMAS version. Your supervisor will automatically be notified about this issue.
%1$s saved successfully, but was unable to synchronize.
%1$s could not be saved because of an internal error.
%1$s could not be created because of an internal error.
%1$s has been saved, but could not be synchronized.
%1$s has been created, but could not be synchronized.
Please specify the time of sampling.
Please further specify the sample material.
Please enter the first name of the case person.
Please enter the last name of the case person.
Please enter the name and description of the health facility.
Please specify the date of last contact.
Please enter the first name of the contact person.
Please enter the last name of the contact person.
Please specify the relation to the case person.
Please specify the type of place.
Please further specify the type of place.
Please enter the first name of the event source.
Please enter the second name of the event source.
Please enter the telephone number of the event source.
Please enter an involvement description for the event person.
Please enter the first name of the event person.
Please enter the last name of the event person.
There are no more entries to display.
Please select a person or click \'Create\' to create a new one.
Please enter a first and last name for the new person.
Problem report successfully sent. Please wait until your supervisor contacts you. You can now close the app.
Task status could not be edited because of an internal error.
An assignee reply is required when setting the task status to not executable.
Please specify the classification of the case associated with this task before you mark it as Done.
Synchronization conflicts detected. Please check the Sync Log to review them.
The case has been successfully moved.
The case could not be moved.
Thank you, your weekly report has been confirmed.
Your weekly report has been confirmed, but could not be synchronized.
Confirmation of weekly report has failed.
SORMAS needs access to your GPS location for all of its features to work as intended. Please click on \"Turn On GPS\" to enable the required functionality on your device.
SORMAS needs access to your GPS location for all of its features to work as intended. Please click on \"Allow GPS Access\" to allow SORMAS to access the required functionality on your device.

You have not confirmed your report for the last epi week. If you want to add a case you\'ve not yet reported for the last epi week, please visit the Reports screen and click on \'Add Missing Case\'. You will have to confirm your report before creating a new case for this week.
The symptoms selected match the clinical criteria for %1$s. The plague type has been be set to %2$s for this case.
There are unsynchronized changes on your device. If you log out now, they will be lost and you will not be able to restore them. Do you still want to log out of SORMAS?
Please select the disease for this case.
Please enter the name of the disease.
Please enter the person\'s first name.
Please enter the person\'s last name.
Please enter the name and description of the health facility.
Please enter a description for the place the case has been reported at.
Please enter the date of initial symptom onset.
Please select the initial onset symptom.
Please specify the location where the patient became ill.
Please select a state for this symptom.
Please enter the additional hemorrhagic symptoms.
Please enter the additional clinical symptoms.
Temperature is in fever range. Fever should be set to \'Yes\'.
Please select the relation to the case.
Please enter a valid last contact date.
Please select the type of event.
Please enter a description for the event.
Please select the type of place.
Please describe the type of place.
Please enter the first name of the event source.
Please enter the last name of the event source.
Please enter the telephone number of the event source.
Please enter the date and time when the sample has been taken.
The visit cannot be more than 30 days before the last contact date.
The visit cannot be more than 30 days after the end of the follow-up duration.
Please enter the date and time of the visit.
Please select the date of discharge.
Please select the date of admission.
The %1$s can not be later than the %2$s.
The %1$s can not be later than the %2$s.
The EPID number does not match the required pattern. You may still save the case and enter the correct number later.
An EPID number has to be provided. You may still save the case and enter the correct number later.
This case should be classified as soon as the required information is available.
Please either select No Outcome Yet or the appropriate outcome for this case.
Please add an entry to the list if there is any data available to you.
Please fill in this field if possible. You can still save without doing so.
Sign into SORMAS to continue the journey of saving lives.
Could not authenticate. Please check your username and password.
You do not have the needed permissions. Please contact the support.
Could not find a SORMAS server at \'%s\'
You are not connected to the internet.
Unable to send report at this time.
Synchronization failed. Please try again later.
Could not connect to SORMAS server. Synchronization canceled. Try again later.
Add a new entry by pressing the "+" symbol in the top right.
There were no %1$s found. To add a new entry, press the "+" symbol at the top right of the toolbar.
SORMAS requires device encryption to be activated on your device to ensure data security.\n\nPlease note that you cannot use the application as long as device encryption is disabled.
Please choose a four-digit PIN which you will use to authenticate yourself whenever you open the SORMAS app.
Please choose a new four-digit PIN to authenticate when opening the SORMAS app in the future.
Please enter the new PIN again.
Please briefly describe the problem you have experienced. Don\'t enter any personal or otherwise sensitive data!
To reset your PIN you will need your SORMAS user password.
The PINs you\'ve entered do not match. Please try again.
PIN has to be four digits long.
PIN must not be made of consecutive numbers.
PIN must not have more than 2 equal numbers.
Sample has not been tested yet
Please tick an answer for ALL symptoms indicating if they occurred during this illness between symptom onset and case detection:
Please indicate if any of the following is relevant for the patient during the incubation period or illness.
Please indicate an answer regarding ALL animals (live or dead) the person had direct exposure to (e.g. hunt, touch, eat) during the incubation period.
You are at the last page. Use the navigation menu to view a specify page or the back button to visit the previous page.
There was an internal problem while attempting to initiate a move case.
%1$s could not be moved because of an internal error.
%1$s could not be moved because of a validation error.
There has been an internal error, contact administrator.
%1$s could not be processed because of a validation error.
Select anyone of the persons below that match by tapping.
No records found matching the first and last name.
No summary to display for the %1$s section.
